st:Description.name: DXF
st:Description.st:role: Handling of DXF Data Exchange Import and Export parameters
st:Description.st:detailedRole: Handling of DXF Data Exchange Import and Export parameters

st:attribute.Name: ImportDftStandard
st:attribute.st:role: name of the Drafting standard that defines the standard of the resulting Drawing

st:attribute.Name: ImportDxfStandard
st:attribute.st:role: name of the Dxf standard, which define the different mapping used at import

st:attribute.Name: ImportUnit
st:attribute.st:role: the unit of the input file

st:enum.st:role: The unit of the input file is Millimeter
The unit of the input file is Centimeter
The unit of the input file is Meter
The unit of the input file is Inch
The unit of the input file is Foot
The unit of the input file is given by a ScaleFactor applied to Millimeter
The unit of the input file is determined Automatically

st:attribute.Name: ImportScaleNumerator
st:attribute.st:role: Get the numerator value of the scale factor. That value is only taken into account when the import unit is set to Scale Factor.

st:attribute.Name: ImportScaleDenominator
st:attribute.st:role: Get the denominator value of the scale factor. That value is only taken into account when the import unit is set to Scale Factor.

st:attribute.Name: ImportPaperSpacesInBackground
st:attribute.st:role: Put the Paper Spaces in Background View

st:attribute.Name: ImportKeepModelSpace
st:attribute.st:role: Keep the Model Space even if referenced by Viewports

st:enum.st:role: Never create end points.
Create end points only for few entities.
Always create end points.
Convert dimensions as dimensions
The Convert dimensions as details
Convert dimensions as geometry
Export All sheets. One File is generated per none empty sheet.
Export only the current sheet in a single file.
Export a DXF or DWG with a format AutoCAD R12.
Export a DXF or DWG with a format AutoCAD R13.
Export a DXF or DWG with a format AutoCAD R14.
Export a DXF or DWG with a format AutoCAD 2000 (same as 2000i and 2002).
Export a DXF or DWG with a format AutoCAD 2004 (same as 2005 and 2006).
Export a DXF or DWG with a format AutoCAD 2007 (same as 2008).
Export semantic.
Export graphic.
Export Blocks None.
Export Blocks One level.
Export Blocks Full level.
